Game.Name: Virtua Tennis (USA)
Game.plot: The Dreamcast version of the game included a World tour mode were you could challenge tennis pros and play tennis themed mini-games to become the number one ranked tennis player in the world. You could play the game either singles or doubles. Game modesArcade (singles/doubles)Exhibition (singles/doubles)Woirld CircuitPlayable characters Cedric Pioline in action.
